node.title: Who is Judge Regina Chu and who are the other key players in the Kimberly Potter trial?
node.alt: Judge Regina Chu presiding over jury selection last week.
node.description: Here are the key people who are part of the trial over the fatal shooting of Daunte Wright.
node.content: ["The trial of Kimberly Potter, the former police officer charged with manslaughter in the fatal shooting of Daunte Wright during a traffic stop, is being streamed live on television and online.", "Because of the Covid-19 pandemic, few people will be allowed in the courtroom except the defendant, the jury, the judge and other court staff, and lawyers for the prosecution and the defense. Three seats each will also be reserved for relatives of Mr. Wright and Ms. Potter. Two seats will be reserved for a rotating pool of journalists.", "Here are the key people who are part of the trial.", "The Judge", "The Defendant", "The Jury", "The Prosecution", "The Defense"]
